EmailTemplate.name: TEST- Marty/Owen PCF.Email 2 - Case Study
EmailTemplate.subject: See how one top merchant increased sales by 64%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case study: TwirlyGirl See how merchants like you have increased sales with Bigcommerce Thousands of businesses around the world have become more successful by switching to Bigcommerce. Since Cynthia and Michael Jamin of TwirlyGirl <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/twirlygirl-case-study-pcf.html]]> moved their children's clothing store, they've seen:
- A 64% increase in sales - A 51% increase in monthly revenue - A 43% increase in monthly transactions
Our free case study has all the details on how TwirlyGirl has grown with Bigcommerce.
Download the case study <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/twirlygirl-case-study-pcf.html]]>
Please give us a call <[[tel:+18446328911]]> if you'd like to learn more about Bigcommerce.
